scenario_text.value: I was right. This is the same tunnel!
We came through here to get to the shrine.
And then we woke up in another world.
You mean... Is it really true?

What’s going on? What’s true? What are you
two talking about?
I don’t get it at all!

What we’re saying is...this might not be your
world, Agumon.
Huh?! But if this isn’t my world, then...
...what does that mean? Where are we?

Come on, we need to get through this tunnel.
That’ll clear things up for sure!
